name: VOLTAGE (itch) (maxie)
description:
enter VOLTAGE : a chaotic retro arena bullet hell roguelike where you fight against hordes and waves of alien creatures and can slow down time to intricately dodge volleys of bullets.

- collect 26 weird and wacky items
- brutally destroy 7 different species of aliens
- slow down time to carefully weave your way through waves of bullets 
- bask in the blood of your enemies
- have fun with mike

CONTROLS :
move : wasd
aim : mouse
shoot : left click
slow down time : right click
pause : escape
e : interact

have fun slaughtering aliens, collecting mike, and dying !
